results.title: Vitamin D was Superior to Omega-3 as a Simvastatin Adjuvant in Improving Blood Lipids and Atherogenic Index in Type-I Dyslipidemic Rats.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@Vitamin D@@@ was Superior to Omega-3 as a @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Adjuvant in Improving Blood @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@Lipids@@@ and Atherogenic Index in @<m>DISEASE_Hypersensitivity_Immediate</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006969 @@@Type-I Dyslipidemic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Lianto D, Djabir YY, Mustamu BO, Arsyad A. Vitamin D was Superior to Omega-3 as a Simvastatin Adjuvant in Improving Blood Lipids and Atherogenic Index in Type-I Dyslipidemic Rats. Turk J Pharm Sci. 2024 Jan 19;20(6):390-396. PMID: 38256280
citations.BibTeX: @article{38256280, title={Vitamin D was Superior to Omega-3 as a Simvastatin Adjuvant in Improving Blood Lipids and Atherogenic Index in Type-I Dyslipidemic Rats.}, author={Lianto D and Djabir YY and Mustamu BO and Arsyad A}, journal={Turk J Pharm Sci}, volume={20}, number={6}, pages={390-396}}

results.title: Simvastatin induces impairment in skeletal muscle while heart is protected.
results.text_hl: Using fluorescence imaging analysis and oxygraphy on @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ and @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ skinned skeletal muscle samples, we show that the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Myopathy_with_Giant_Abnormal_Mitochondria @DISEASE_MESH:C564971 @@@mitochondria impairment@@@ results from inhibition of the complex @<m>DISEASE_Hypersensitivity_Immediate</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006969 @@@I@@@ of respiratory chain.

citations.NLM: Sirvent P, Bordenave S, Vermaelen M, Roels B, Vassort G, Mercier J, Raynaud E, Lacampagne A. Simvastatin induces impairment in skeletal muscle while heart is protected. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2005 Dec 23;338(3):1426-34. PMID: 16271704
